title: 求一份史诗攻城mod1.7.10配置文件的汉化版
author: Grave_tiger
txt_content:
如题，感谢伸出援手的大佬！本人十分喜欢这款mod中的怪物AI，只是技术不过关无法达到最佳游戏体验，所以想降低一下难度，奈何又是英语渣。

另外问一下，我想修改（定制）方块的硬度和动物/怪物的爆落物品，请问应该下载什么mod？

replies.author: sss1
replies.txt_content:
epicsiegemod.cfg
(8.71 KB, 下载次数: 566)



2017-10-17 23:51 上传
点击文件名下载附件






注意 
此文件大部分是自己翻译的。
小部分内容参考原贴提供的新版mod配置文件。
内容难免有遗漏不准确。
因为你提供的不是文件，而是文本，所以格式上会有不同。
 我感觉你提供的有些乱（有些设置连自带的注释都没有？）。
姑且先发上来吧，你看看能不能用。
不能用的话，请提供MOD的初始设置文件。


最后，感觉费那么长时间就100金粒…… _(:зゝ∠)_

replies.author: sss1
replies.txt_content:
我下载不了这MOD，CURSE上不去。
给我一份英文的配置，我尝试一下。可以吗？

replies.author: Grave_tiger
replies.txt_content:
sss1 发表于 2017-10-17 17:55
我下载不了这MOD，CURSE上不去。
给我一份英文的配置，我尝试一下。可以吗？ ...
# Configuration file"Advanced Mobs" {
# Animals will fight back if provoked [default: true]
B:"Animals Retaliate"=true
B:"Attack Evasion"=true # Every time a boss is killed all mob heal and damage multipliers will be increased by this [range: 0.0 ~ 3.4028235E38, default: 0.1]
S:"Boss Kill Modifier"=0.1 # Mob Bombs are now Crystals instead of Creepers
B:"Crystal Bombs"=false # Zombies and Skeletons will use boats in water to catch up to you! [default: true]
B:"Mob Boating"=true # Skip the Mob Bomb list and allow everything!
B:"Mob Bomb All"=true # Inverts the mob bomb listing to be act as a blacklist [default: false]
B:"Mob Bomb Invert"=false
I:"Mob Bomb Rarity"=9
S:"Mob Bombs" <
Spider
> # Mobs are passive until provoked [default: false]
B:"Neutral Mobs"=false
I:"Potion Buff Chance (0-100)"=1 # List of all the valid potion IDs a mob can spawn with. Amplifier is always x1
I:"Potion Buff List" <
14
12
5
1
>
I:"Wither Skeleton Rarity"=9
B:"Wither Skeletons"=true
}
Blaze {
I:"Dimension Blacklist" <
>
I:Fireballs=9
I:Rarity=9
B:Spawn=true
}
Creeper {
B:Breaching=true # AND HIS NAME IS... [default: false]
B:"Cena Creeper"=false # How rare are they [range: 0 ~ 2147483647, default: 9]
I:"Cena Creeper Rarity"=9 # Creepers will run at you at speed before detonating [default: true]
B:Chargering=true
B:Napalm=true
B:Powered=true
I:"Powered Rarity"=9
}
"Dimension Tweaks" { Overworld {
I:"01.Dimension ID"=0
D:"02.Health Mult"=1.0
D:"03.Damage Mult"=1.0
D:"04.Speed Mult"=1.0
D:"05.Knockback Resistance Mult"=1.0
}}
Enderman {
B:"Player Teleport"=true # Makes Endermen stalk players with side effects
B:Slender-Mode=false
}
Ghast {
B:Breaching=true
I:"Dimension Blacklist" <
>
D:"Fire Delay"=1.0
D:"Fire Distance"=64.0
I:Rarity=9
B:Spawn=false
}
Main {
S:"AI Exempt Mob IDs" <
VillagerGolem
>
B:"Allow Sleep"=false # If set to true, ESM will not check whether the entity is a mob or not when setting up new AI
B:"Ambiguous AI"=true
B:"Apocalypse Mode"=false # Mobs will attack player owned pets [default: true]
B:"Attack Pets"=true
I:"Awareness Radius"=64
B:"Chaos Mode"=false # Ignores world specific settings and just uses the global defaults instead
B:"Enforce Defaults"=true # Flips the exemption listing to whitelist mode [default: false]
B:"Flip Exemtions"=false # Forces non pathing mobs to attack from further away. Can cause additional lag
B:"Force Non-AI Pathing"=false # Can mobs harm eachother (type specific in chaos mode) [default: true]
B:"Friendly Fire"=true # The interval in which 'hard' days will occur where mob spawning is increased and lighting is ignored (0 = off, default = 8/full moon) [range: 0 ~ 2147483647, default: 8]
I:"Hardcore Day Cycle"=8 # Mobs inflict double damage on hardcore days [default: false]
B:"Hardcore Double Damage"=false # Keeps mobs with an active target from despawning. Can causes issues with chunk loading/unloading
B:"Keep Loaded"=false # Reduces spawning safe zone from 24 blocks to 8 and makes mobs require only basic conditions to spawn
B:"More Spawning"=true
I:"Pathing Cap"=16 # If set to fales, mobs can use much longer routes to get to their target
B:"Quick Pathing"=false # The amount of ticks of resistance given to the player after changing dimensions
I:"Resistance Cooldown"=200
B:"Villager Targeting"=true # How many days until ESM spawns mobs at full rate. [range: 0 ~ 2147483647, default: 7]
I:"Warm Up Days"=7
B:"Xray Mobs"=true
}
Skeleton {
I:"Arrow Error"=0
I:"Fire Distance"=64
}
Spider {
I:"Webbing Chance (0-100)"=25
}
Witch {
# List of potion types witches can throw ("id:duration:lvl") [default: [7:1:0], [2:300:0], [15:300:0], [19:300:0], [18300:1], [4300:2]]
S:"Custom Potions" <
7:1:0
2:300:0
15:300:0
19:300:0
18300:1
4300:2
>
}
##########################################################################################################
# World
#--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------#
# For the main list of options please refer to the ESM_Options.cfg file in your world directory.
##########################################################################################################World {
I:"Fort Dimensions" <
0
>
I:"Fort Distance"=1024
I:"Fort Rarity"=100
S:"Fort Spawner Types" <
Zombie
Creeper
Skeleton
CaveSpider
Silverfish
Spider
Slime
Witch
>
B:"Spawn Forts"=true
B:"Use New End"=false
B:"Use New Nether"=false
}
Zombie {
# Use the digging blacklist as a whitelist instead
B:"Blacklist to Whitelist"=false # Zombies can placed armed TNT
B:"De**tion Zombies"=true
B:Diggers=true # Blacklisted blocks for digging (Add ':#' for metadata e.g. 'minecraft:wool:1')
S:"Digging Blacklist" <
> # What blocks will be targeted for destruction when not attacking players (Does not affect general digging, light sources are included by default, add ':#' for metadata e.g. 'minecraft:wool:1')
S:"General Griefable Blocks" <
minecraft:chest
minecraft:furnace
minecraft:crafting_table
minecraft:melon_stem
minecraft:pumpkin_stem
minecraft:fence_gate
minecraft:melon_block
minecraft:pumpkin
minecraft:glass
minecraft:glass_pane
minecraft:stained_glass
minecraft:stained_glass_pane
minecraft:carrots
minecraft:potatoes

minecraft:enchanting_table
minecraft:cake
minecraft:ladder
minecraft:wooden_door
minecraft:farmland
minecraft:bookshelf
minecraft:sapling
minecraft:bed
minecraft:fence
>
B:Infectious=true
B:"Need Required Tools"=true # How many blocks to give zombies to pillar up with
I:"Pillaring Blocks"=64
}

我下载不了这MOD，CURSE上不去。
给我一份英文的配置，我尝试一下。可以吗？ ...
配置文件在这里了，感激不尽！希望可以尽量提供语言清晰和内容完整的翻译，谢谢！

注意

哇，这个。。。实在是太感谢了。。。。一百金粒子不够的话可以再追加嘛？我这个号只有160来个。。直接给内容的原因是因为我电脑被老师没收了，暂时只能用手机上号。。
